overview: This up-close and personal look at the underground hip-hop scene features some of the most prominent personalities in the industry sharing their unique perspectives, including artist-producer Kool Keith, artist-actor Saul Williams, underground superstar Aesop Rock and veteran DJ Silva Sir-Fa. In addition to the documentary Street Credentials, this video includes artist interviews, a youth detention center visit with director Iz-Real and more.
title: Hip Hop Street Credentials
